attributes.action: reconsider planning permission for a gypsy camp in hospital lane countesthorpe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some time ago Blaby District Council refused a planning application from a Mr. Buttons for a Gypsy Caravan Site on Hospital Lane.
Mr. Buttons lodged an appeal to Ruth Kelly, a Minister in Blairs Government.  She has over ruled the Council and given permission, against local wishes.Since we where not consulted as a community please add your name as this is a breach of our liberties and i'm sure we dont want a travellers site this close to countesthorpe blaby and wigston
